description: {"blocks":[{"key":"32fp5","text":"This is the HiDEF-seq library preparation protocol for bulk, single-molecule fidelity, long-read sequencing. This version of the HiDEF-seq protocol is designed for high-quality DNA. See our paper \"DNA mismatch and damage patterns revealed by single-molecule sequencing\" (Liu \u0026 Costa et al.) for more information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"23hbt","text":"Dilute the reaction to a DNA concentration of 10ng/µL by adding 80µL of Nuclease Free Water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1geci","text":"Note: If more or less than 1500ng of DNA was input into the library preparation, calculate the amount of water to add to obtain 10ng/µL of DNA concentration and then adjust the subsequent bead cleanup volume accordingly.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":220}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dvjc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjtqp","text":"Vortex mix and spin down","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgjng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29rvq","text":"Perform a 0.8X Bead Clean:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nnge","text":"Add 120µL of 75% PacBio Ampure Beads.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27fhb","text":"Note: If more or less than 1500ng of DNA was input into the library preparation, calculate the amount of 0.8X relative bead volume according to the prior step's post-dilution volume.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":182}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26qc2","text":"Continue with a standard bead clean up, with two 80% Ethanol washes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nsjc","text":"Elute in 22µL of 10mM Tris pH8","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3uc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6d3h","text":"Perform a 0.75X Bead Clean with 75% PacBio Ampure Beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31llr","text":"Calculate bead volume relative to the post-dilution volume of the sample after completing the prior step","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ahsa","text":"Wash twice with 80% Ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk18i","text":"Elute in 22µL of 10mM Tris pH8","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb6sv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3i8gh","text":"Dilute the samples to a maximum of 10ng/µL based on the Qubit values after the cleanup that followed the E. {"blocks":[{"key":"2th8u","text":"Dilute the samples to a maximum of 10ng/µL based on the post Restriction Enzyme Digest Clean Up Qubit values, using the following equation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fckpk","text":"Volume to add = (Qubit Concentration)(21µL)/(10ng/µL) - 30µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4tvt","text":"Vortex mix and spin down","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ktci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7shgi","text":"Perform a 0.75X Bead Clean with 75% PacBio Ampure Beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d6do","text":"Calculate bead volume relative to the post-dilution volume of the sample after completing the prior step","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nto8","text":"Wash twice with 80% Ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42qj","text":"Elute in 22µL of 10mM Tris pH8","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjk8g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"coset","text":"This is the HiDEF-seq v2 protocol with A-Tailing used for high-quality DNA as assessed by fragment size analysis (e.g., TapeStation). For low-quality DNA samples, refer to our paper for the relevant protocol: Liu \u0026 Costa et al. DNA mismatch and damage patterns revealed by single-molecule sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6roia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
